```{r KnitrOpts, echo=FALSE}
knitr::opts_knit$set(root.dir = normalizePath('../'))
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo=TRUE, message=TRUE, warning=TRUE, error=TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(RSQLite)
library(tidyr)

con <- dbConnect(drv = SQLite(), dbname = "../cleaned/disag.db")
dfDisag <- dbGetQuery(con, "SELECT * FROM disag")
```

```{r ListObjects}
lstObjects <- represtools::ListObjects("df")
represtools::DescribeObjects(represtools::NamesToObjects(lstObjects))
```

```{r Save}
save(file = represtools::OutputFile(params)
     , list = lstObjects)
```
